item.title: Macy’s stock rallies after same-store sales see first growth since 2022
item.description: Sales rise at the 125 stores in Macy’s “Reimagine” network, as well as Bluemercury and Bloomingdale’s locations.

item.title: Campbell’s is catering to health-conscious consumers who are cooking more at home
item.description: Campbell’s stock rallies as the continued consumer trend of cooking from home helped fuel a profit beat.

item.title: ‘Her kids will have no inheritance’: Will my friend lose her house to Medicaid if she goes into a nursing home?
item.description: “She would like to leave her kids something after she dies.”

item.title: Job openings fall again and hiring has stalled. More evidence of weakening U.S. labor market.
item.description: The number of job openings in the U.S. fell in July to the second lowest level since the pandemic and hiring patterns signal labor market is even weak...

item.title: I’m 70 and have $2.6 million for retirement. Is 80% in equities too risky?
item.description: “We have been living primarily off my pensions, but plan on big family trips soon.”
